# Project description #
This is a project from github  that i forked. It's one of the early version for minecraft.

## Technology stack ##
Java 8
Lwjgl 2.9.3

## Documentation ##
Always add javadocs to your code and comments.
For older code, add comments explaining the code and the best javadoc you can do.

## Coding style ##
Java preferred coding style:
- Curly brackets are now at the end of the line (Egyptian style).
- Indentation uses tab characters (\t).

## Git ##
Always commit after each change, and write in the description of the commit what you changed and why. This will help us to understand the history of the project and to find bugs more easily.
